text: He nabi! Yetiya mumina naraisakale tomara ocarata ahi e'i samparke ba'i'ata karae ye, sihamte allahara lagata ana kako ansidara sthapana nakaraiba, curai nakaraiba, byabhicara nakaraiba, nija santanasakalaka hatya nakaraiba, icchakrtabharae nije apabada racana karai ratana karai nuphuraiba arau satkamata tomara abadhya nahaâ€™ba, tetiya tumi sihamtara ba'i'ata grahana karaa arau sihamtara babe allahara ocarata ksama praarthana karaa. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
